traffic signs.description: A blue rectangular traffic sign showing a parking area symbol and a circular sign indicating a speed limit of 5 km/h on the right side of the road.
traffic signs.explanation: These signs indicate the presence of a parking area nearby and enforce a speed limit which the ego car must adhere to for safety and legal reasons.

traffic cones.description: Multiple orange and white traffic cones placed around construction materials or debris on the right side of the road.
traffic cones.explanation: These cones are indicating a road hazard or construction zone, reducing the available lane width for the driving path of the ego car.

general_perception.description and explanation:
In the observed traffic scene, there are two notable categories of road elements. The first includes a traffic sign that is blue and rectangular, displaying a symbol for a parking area, accompanied by a nearby circular sign indicating a speed limit of 5 km/h. These signs are positioned on the right side of the road, primarily to guide the ego car to recognize the proximity of a parking area and to enforce a speed limit which must be adhered to for both safety and legal compliance.

The second category encompasses multiple traffic cones that are orange and white, strategically placed around construction materials or debris, also located on the right side of the road. These cones serve the purpose of signaling a road hazard or construction zone. They play a crucial role in reducing the available lane width, thereby directly influencing the driving path of the ego car. This configuration necessitates cautious navigation and potential adjustment in the driving path by the autonomous driving system to ensure safety.

1.description and explanation: This object is identified as debris, which is a accumulation of non-uniform materials, possibly including bags and other light materials left on the roadside. For a driving scenario, this debris would necessitate caution as it could potentially obstruct part of the lane or cause distractions to the driver. It would likely influence the driver to reduce speed and possibly adjust the steering to avert any contact with the debris.

2.description and explanation: This object is a traffic cone, generally used to signal to drivers that they should not cross into certain areas, for either safety reasons or due to ongoing road work or hazards. Its placement could influence the driver of the ego car to remain vigilant and possibly change lanes or adjust their driving path to maintain a safe distance from the indicated hazard or restricted area.

3.description and explanation: This object is identified as debris. It appears to be a collection of miscellaneous materials such as bags, fabrics, possibly some construction-related materials or sandbags laid out on the side of the road. Such obstructions on or near the driving lane pose potential hazards; they could either obstruct visual clarity or physical movement, compelling drivers to potentially navigate around them, thereby increasing the risk for accidents or driving inefficiencies. Ensuring the ego car is aware of such debris will necessitate cautious driving and possibly a slight alteration in the driving path to avoid any contact with the debris.

driving_suggestion: Maintain a reduced speed of 5 km/h as per the speed limit sign, be prepared to shift slightly to the left within the driving lane to safely pass the road construction materials to the right while being mindful of oncoming traffic in the opposite lane. Stay vigilant for any construction workers or additional signage that might provide further instruction or restrictions.
